column4: Can someone help me with Xorg.conf?  I just need to set resolution to 720p  (1280x720)  but I also need to adjust something like horizontal and vertical frequencies?  But I don't know what they should be set to?
Is there a way to figure that out?
i think your best bet would be to compare your xorg.conf to another xorg.conf file that has the sections you need
i'd show you mine, but it doesn't have what you need, i think because of my graphics driver
